# sharpness

**Instance Property**

The sharpness of the circles.

## Declaration

```swift
var sharpness: Float { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **center**: The x and y position to use as the center of the circular screen pattern.
- **inputImage**: The image to use as an input image.
- **width**: The distance between each circle in the pattern.
